visual.name: scvationDataSlicer
visual.description: Slicer visual to filter a large number of elements using copy/paste

enableIntervalSelection.description: Allows you to make interval selections with numeric and text values (e.g. 5..20 selects all values from 5 to 20). Enabling the feature has a negative impact on performance.

intervalInputDateFormat.description: Date input format. Only relevant if a date attribute is used.

hiddenSearchTextareaValue.description: Contains the value of the search textarea.

hiddenLicenseKey.description: License Key for the SCvation Data Filter Visual is saved here.
